website_summaries.verdict: A compact evaporative cooling fan that is small enough to fit on your desk or nightstand.
pros: This highly portable unit can work with just 4 AA batteries or you can plug it in using a USB cord
The machine can run at high or low speeds and it features a timer for automatic shut off
cons: This model may leak water, so be careful about positioning it near sensitive electronics or on a table that could be ruined by water

customer_reviews.title: Portable Air Conditioner Fan
customer_reviews.text: This portable air conditioner fan has a basic mechanism - it has a fan and some type of radiator inside of it. Once you poor some water in it and maybe through some ice cubes, the radiator soaks in the water and gets wet and the fan blows through it and makes the air cold plus it humidifies the room, so it is not too dry. It also has an option to use it with 4 AA batteries. 2 modes: slow and high and a timer.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim Safonov

customer_reviews.title: Small and portable
customer_reviews.text: This is for a very small space. Don't expect it to cool a room. It's perfect for my needs. I do outdoor craft fairs and put it right on my table. It's small and portable. I use it with batteries. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEAKs and Weak Fan Speed - No Returnable, work with Amazon to resolve (BEWARE of this seller)
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know you CAN'T return a defective unit buying from Amazon. I am currently working with Amazon product support to resolve this issue. This is a hassle to have to work with Amazon in order to get refunded from this seller, hopefully I can. I have always been able to return products and I buy lots from Amazon with peace of mind. This unit leaks water at the bottom on the second day, not a slow leak. There are 2 fan speeds with not much difference (LL and HH), both are pretty weak. You need to place it within 4 feet to get any cooling effect.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Woo

customer_reviews.title: Works, BUT!
customer_reviews.text: Well, disappointed! Nice idea, but you can't use this thing on the low setting unless you want a headache from the rattle noise it has. On high, seems to drown out that noise, whatever it is? Some kind of vibration maybe from something loose? Anyway, I can use it, but since only on the high setting, which is pretty noisy itself, am probably going to return it!!
customer_reviews.author: PamM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a knock off it doesn't work. It's like a low speed fan and it doesn't get cold at all. I tried cold water, and faucet water no difference in out put. Very disappointing. My husband saw one at our brother's house and he seemed to think that it made a difference, so back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Martha M Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Not quality advertised
customer_reviews.text: Broken out of the box leading me to conclude it was poorly made. Didn’t function with batteries alone. Tried the cord adaptation and it powered on but display flickered until ultimately dying
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. It does not cool anything. The fan is so weak, it will not blow air through the wet evaporative filter. NO cooling takes place. It is a great idea, but this thing does nothing but waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Engebretson

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile, would recommend a more durable product
customer_reviews.text: This little thing worked for a couple days, then one day, it wouldn’t hold the water?! The reservoir responsible for holding the water, creating the cool air being forced out, wouldn’t hold the water any longer. There’s possibly something wrong with the threading on the lid, or maybe I just got a bad unit?🤷🏼‍♀️ Wouldn’t buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Hahn

customer_reviews.title: It needs batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is small and portable. I don’t like that it came with no batteries. It needs 4AA batteries. It was affordable and can really be taken anywhere. Very easy and convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: MIC81

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great little a.c. only one problem significant water spillage wish it had a tray to catch the water
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Cool air fast...
customer_reviews.text: Portable, efficient and does the job! Perfect to use with my grandkids in the hot weather when they are in the stroller. Super portable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: IT LEAKED !! RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: You read it right. Right out of the box, put half a cup water in and voila, leaking like crazy. It look like a computer fan put in a fancy box but unfortunately cannot keep the water in check. Returning this junk right away
customer_reviews.author: Minh Tran

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the car on a long trip. Didn’t work like I thought but works great in my office
customer_reviews.author: Nathan and Christi Young

customer_reviews.title: Better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold as much water as others. Smaller fan. Cools ok. Leaks water on my desk if not careful how you add water. I don't use the timer as much as I thought I would. There is Better options for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A.

customer_reviews.title: No worth
customer_reviews.text: Not good as they say ,I read some reviews saying was very good ,I try it and is not good enough, not to cool air.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo simon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work well, I am very disappointed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice portable AC it uses less power but it still is effective!
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Chokshi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work coming out of the box
customer_reviews.text: My unit didn’t work coming out of the box. And the help line was no help .....
customer_reviews.author: Toria

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on the fan!!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike because it doesn’t do what it says it will. The difference between low and high was very disappointing. I wouldn’t recommend this product to any of my family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn King

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give less stars. You’d have better luck using a hand held fan from the dollar store. You cannot return the product or I would have. So please don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Pezdispencer182

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't blow very hard and doesn't blow very cold regardless of how cold the water in is
customer_reviews.author: katt

customer_reviews.title: A kindergarten kid created this?
customer_reviews.text: If I put a frozen cloth in front of my fan, and it........$$$???? than I don't think I have to say any thing else. Bottom line.
customer_reviews.author: Trien

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money!!!! Water leaks out of it, air never got cool and it barely blows hard enough to move a feather.
customer_reviews.author: Bodeene

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Hardly notice a difference, a cheap walmart fan is better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small cooler for a desk area
customer_reviews.text: This Little air conditioner can be helpful to have at work or at home . It doesn’t reach a big area though.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your Money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the Money, a regular Fan would do better Doesn't cool anything. Bought it hoping it would.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: To small of fan, lack of air flow.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described but I think the fan is too small you don't get a big enough breeze.
customer_reviews.author: rickmtd

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This item was a disappointment & unfortunately its ineligible to be returned. Twenty-five dollars down the drain. I wouldnt recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Young

customer_reviews.title: Probably a no go
customer_reviews.text: Truly not cool. Like not even a good fan. So confused by it
customer_reviews.author: wolfe lanier

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: First time that I put water in it, started liking all over my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Elvia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The SGODDE Portable Air Conditioner Fan is amazing only with water and has cold air. Place the fan with the water compartment facing up, remove the cap and invert water into the compartment without exceeding the maximum, then plug in the USB Y cable and open the battery compartment and insert 4AA batteries (not included) and turn on the fan (wait approximately 3 minutes for the filter to get completely wet). It has 2 high and low speeds and a timer. It has a front window that turns 90 degrees up and down. In low speed the water lasts approximately 8. Very good for summer, it is practical for the office, home, outdoor activities, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cruz

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: A HANDHELD PERSONAL FAN HAS MORE POWER!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!! YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO FEEL IT'S OUTPUT IF YOUR FACE IS AN INCH IN FRONT OF IT!! BUT EVEN THEN IT'S STILL A WASTE OF YOUR MONEY!!! I DON'T THINK A DOLLAR STORE WOULD BOTHER PUT THIS ON THEIR SHELVES.
customer_reviews.author: REUSCH

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: i fill to water the limit is and it started leaking water around the bottom i used batteries and it was not cold
customer_reviews.author: christina s pelaez

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: When you turn it on only part of a letter or number is shown. It does not changed speeds, actually it has no speed and thus no cooling. Your manufacture screwed the pooch on this one!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bonnet

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised it works as well as it does. It looks like a toy, but it works very well if you're right in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Using this to keep my bedroom a little extra chill. First time using it made my room space chilled. This will be great to have around my kids and family that might need it. I do wish the fan was quieter.
customer_reviews.author: John Bell

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a piece of crap it didnt work it lept turning on and off also it leaked all the water. I don loke it one bit anlso fan blows very little even when set at high.
customer_reviews.author: José Pérez

customer_reviews.title: NOT ELEGIBLE FOR RETURNING
customer_reviews.text: Think twice about this item, this product isn’t work like they described, if you want to feel the coolest air this item has to be near of you as possible, any fan works better than this portable air, this is a simple toy. “Don’t buy it, Don’t waisted your money” and important It’s not elegible for retun.
customer_reviews.author: Iris A. Rodriguez

product_meta.title: SGODDE Portable Air Conditioner Fan, 2019 Latest USB Mini Personal Air Cooler Fan, Mini Cooler, Desktop Cooling Fan, Table Fan for Bedroom, Travel, Office
feature_bullets: ❄【Personal Air Cooler】Two-speed air cooler with Low, High mode. Choose the perfect wind speed according to your needs. You could enjoy low speed when you are in sleeping and high speed in scorching summer.You can add ice cubes and water into the water tank for evaporative misting cooling in this personal table fan, bring more misting in a short time and drive away the dryness for you.

❄【Easy to Use】Press Power button “ON/OFF” to power on Arctic, set the Air Cooler Fan speed by pressing “SPEED” button. You can choose from Low, High mode.And the indicator LED display show you which speed Air Cooler is currently running, wind outlet blade can be 90°adjusted up and down like air conditioner.The compact design fits nicely on your office desk, nightstand or coffee table etc.

❄【Portable Handle】This portable mini air conditioner fan is designed with a handle, small size, you can easily carry it out, very suitable for homes, offices, outdoor picnics, etc. On summer, just press the switch to enjoy the air-cool, is your summer life's best partner. ♦Hot and dry climates is the Optimum operating condition. ♦

❄【USB Charging Design】Our air cooler only need 4xAAs batteries in it. And You can plug the larger USB end into a computer to power Air Cooler as well. ♦NOTE: This fan will not be as cold as air conditioner and can not make the room cool but it is much cooler than the fan and will not make you skin dry.

❄【Energy Saving & No-Freon】Low Energy Consumption same as the power consumption of a light bulb, uses no freon, much cheaper than running a freon air conditioner in Hot Summer Days. No blades exposed no possibility to hurt people and totally safe for sitting beside sofa or next to your kids, lovely pets, or anywhere you would like to be cooler, perfect for home and travel.
